## ciliumctl bpf vtep

Manage the VTEP mappings for IP/CIDR <-> VTEP MAC/IP

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for vtep
```

### Options inherited from parent commands

```
      --config string   Config file (default is $HOME/.cilium.yaml)
  -D, --debug           Enable debug messages
  -H, --host string     URI to server-side API
```

### SEE ALSO

* [ciliumctl bpf](ciliumctl_bpf.md)	 - Direct access to local BPF maps
* [ciliumctl bpf vtep delete](ciliumctl_bpf_vtep_delete.md)	 - Delete vtep entries
* [ciliumctl bpf vtep list](ciliumctl_bpf_vtep_list.md)	 - List VTEP CIDR and their corresponding VTEP MAC/IP
* [ciliumctl bpf vtep update](ciliumctl_bpf_vtep_update.md)	 - Update vtep entries
